EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-12-12-Field-Central-ESB-Dallas.ES-2017-11-30-Dallas-ESB-2.EM-2017-11-30
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Dallas Executive Networking Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/learn-dallas]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on December 12th, as the Mavericks take on the Spurs. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, basketball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, Cisco, Technologent and network with your peers in the technology industry. Dallas Mavericks vs San Antonio Spurs <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-dallas/]]>
Where: American Airlines Center 2500 Victory Avenue, Dallas, TX 75219 Tuesday, December 12th 6:00pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-dallas]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
